objects.text:
• Unique Bohemian Design
• Premium Leather Construction
• Comfortable Padded Insole
• Durable Rubber Outsole

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Boho-Chic Designer Sneaker with Handcrafted Details
product_details.description:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium beige and tan leather construction with artisanal stitching
• Comfortable padded insole with light blue interior lining
• Durable rubber outsole with distinctive bubble texture
• Stylish brown contrast laces for adjustable fit
• Hand-detailed ornamental elements on toe and heel
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day wear
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and artistic expression
• Available in unique earth-tone color combination
• Ideal for fashion-forward individuals seeking distinctive footwear

banner_details:
This banner features a stylish, quadrant layout with a modern bohemian theme, combining earthy and neutral tones to communicate artisanal elegance. The design prominently displays a sneaker product image ("product_image") in the upper-right quadrant, complementing the bold, uppercase titles ("heading_1" and "heading_2") on the left. A clean, geometric serif subheading ("subheading") elevates the tone.

A bulleted feature list ("description") and a prominent price tag ("price") sit on the lower-left, along with a bold call-to-action button ("cta_background" with "cta"). Supporting this is a tagline ("tagline") underscored by a minimal decorative line ("decorative_line"). Abstract vector elements, wave lines, and soft geometric shapes enhance the layout visually.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Beige: `#F5F2EA`
- Warm Tan: `#E8D5C0`
- Rustic Clay: `#D1A77E`
- Terracotta Orange: `#C67C4E`
- Creamy White: `#FFFFFF`
- Chocolate Brown: `#5F3E25`
- Muted Copper: `#7D5A3C`
- Accent Brown: `#94674B`
product_color: The product image showcases a creatively designed shoe with a warm and earthy color palette, merging playful tones into a cohesive look. Dominant hues include a creamy beige (#F5E1C4), warm tan (#D9A066), and burnt orange (#BA4E20), with deeper accents of chocolate brown (#5A2E1B) for the sole details. The lace and patterned accents are highlighted through a rich rust color (#A0451C), creating visual depth. Lighter cream shades outline curves and patterns, enhancing contrast and structure. These harmonized tones can be used to create a banner with a grounded yet vibrant appeal that emphasizes creativity, comfort, and artisanal craftsmanship.
